tests.name: Histogram (1)
tests.run: ./server -r 8080 & sleep 1; N=1000; P=5; ./client -a 127.0.0.1 -r 8080 -n ${N} -p ${P} -w 100 -h 20 -b 5 >out.tst; comm out.tst test-files/data1.txt; kill $! && [ $(wait $! || echo $?) -eq 143 ] && [ $(comm -12 out.tst test-files/data1.txt | wc -l) -eq $(cat test-files/data1.txt | wc -l) ]

tests.name: Histogram (2)
tests.run: ./server -r 8081 & sleep 1; N=10000; P=10; ./client -a 127.0.0.1 -r 8081 -n ${N} -p ${P} -w 100 -h 20 -b 30 >out.tst; comm out.tst test-files/data2.txt; kill $! && [ $(wait $! || echo $?) -eq 143 ] && [ $(comm -12 out.tst test-files/data2.txt | wc -l) -eq $(cat test-files/data2.txt | wc -l) ]

tests.name: CSV File Transfer
tests.run: ./server -r 8082 & sleep 1; ./client -a 127.0.0.1 -r 8082 -w 100 -b 30 -f 1.csv; kill $! && [ $(wait $! || echo $?) -eq 143 ] && diff BIMDC/1.csv received/1.csv

tests.name: Binary File Transfer
tests.run: ./server -r 8083 & sleep 1; ./client -a 127.0.0.1 -r 8083 -w 100 -b 50 -f test.bin; kill $! && [ $(wait $! || echo $?) -eq 143 ] && diff BIMDC/test.bin received/test.bin

tests.name: Binary File Transfer - Large Message Capacity
tests.run: ./server -r 8084 & sleep 1; ./client -a 127.0.0.1 -r 8084 -w 100 -b 50 -m 4096 -f test.bin; kill $! && [ $(wait $! || echo $?) -eq 143 ] && diff BIMDC/test.bin received/test.bin
